name: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type II (50pcs/pack)

overview.title: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type II
overview.text: YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Mask Type II is a disposable 3-ply mask, made of nonwoven fabric which is used for medical and healthcare.

specifications.value:
Main Body: Meltdown and nonwoven fabrics
Ear loops: Elastane cord

T/CTCA 7-2019
GB/T 2912: 2009
GB/T 17593: 2007
YY 0469:2011
EU Standard: EN14683: 2019 Type I
MDD: 93/42/EEC Standard

productDetail:
YHUK™ 3-Ply Surgical Masks Type II

Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE): ≥ 95%

Particulate Filtration Efficiency (PFE): ≥ 80%

Breathing Resistance (Differential Pressure): 34.7 Pa/cm2
Microbial Cleanliness (Bioburden): Not detected
Splash Resistance: NA
Penetration of Synthetic Blood Pressure: NA

The product conforms to T/CTCA 7-2019. It is certified by 'Guangzhou Inspection and Certification Group Co., Ltd.l', a China National Accreditation Service for Conformity Assessment (CNAS) listed testing laboratory.

Type I Surgical Masks should only be used for patients and other persons to reduce the risk of spread of infections particularly in epidemic or pandemic situations. Type I masks are not intended for use by healthcare professionals in an operating room or in other medical settings with similar requirements.
